author: theexercisebabe
text:
If you’re dealing with high stress whether in your career or personal life, Pilates is an excellent type of workout to re-center your mind & also strengthen your body

I’ve been working with a CFO that has had high stress & they have seen a big change in feeling <pain & <tension

author: theexercisebabe
text:
Fitness does not have to mean weight loss❌

Many of the private clients I work with currently are business owners and work with me to:
-stay accountable to their health & wellness goals
-reduce stress
-stay focused
-stay looking their best since they are in public #optimalhealth

author: theexercisebabe
text: Focus on solutions #problemsolve #wintheday

author: theexercisebabe
text:
If you’ve thought that fasting is just for weight loss…think again 

Fasting has many positive benefits that can improve your health! 
-lowers blood pressure 
-can reduce spikes in your blood sugar
-can enhance your focus 
-can reduce overall inflammation 

#fasting #health #fit

author: theexercisebabe
text: If you’re wanting to make a change in order to improve your health, your fitness, finances, relationships, you’re probably going to have to go thru discomfort. It’s all part of the process of reaching your specific goal. To make it thru discomfort easier invest in a coach or pro

author: theexercisebabe
text:
Since graduating college all I know is the startup/entrepreneur world ~10yrs 

4 things I’ve learned you need to know before you start: 
-you have to like to work a lot
-you have to market yourself/brand
-your ability to deal with uncertainty 
-you need to be able to say no a lot

text:
If you’ve fallen off track with your health & fitness goals 3 tips to help you get back on track:
-just start (again)
-find support (a certified coach)
-track your habits & actions

text:
